entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
